title: Understanding Right Triangles
text: In a right triangle, the sum of the angles is always 180°. One angle is always 90° because it's a right triangle.

title: Using Angle Sum Property
text: Since one angle is 90° and another is 45°, you can find the third angle by subtracting the sum of these two angles from 180°.

title: Calculate the Remaining Angle
text: Calculate the remaining angle using the formula: 180° - (90° + 45°).
